trans-unit.source: Associates activities together in a correlation by representing a particular shared <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey" /> or transient context in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Associa le attività in una correlazione rappresentando un particolare <see cref="T:System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstanceKey" /> condiviso o un contesto temporaneo nel flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[wf](~/includes/wf-md.md)] provides four types of correlation: [Content Based](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/content-based-correlation.md), [Request-Reply](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/request-reply-correlation.md), [Durable Duplex](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/durable-duplex-correlation.md), and [Context Exchange](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/context-exchange-correlation.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[wf](~/includes/wf-md.md)] sono disponibili quattro tipi di correlazione: [basato su contenuto](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/content-based-correlation.md), [Request/Reply](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/request-reply-correlation.md), [Duplex durevole](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/durable-duplex-correlation.md), e [lo scambio del contesto](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/context-exchange-correlation.md).

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] correlation, see [Correlation Overview](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/correlation-overview.md), the specific correlation types mentioned previously, and the correlation samples located in the [Services [WF Samples]](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/services.md) node of the [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] samples.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] correlazione, vedere [Panoramica della correlazione](~/docs/framework/wcf/feature-details/correlation-overview.md), i tipi di correlazione specifici indicati in precedenza e gli esempi di correlazione che si trovano nel [servizi [esempi WF] ](~/docs/framework/windows-workflow-foundation/samples/services.md) nodo il [!INCLUDE[wf1](~/includes/wf1-md.md)] esempi.

trans-unit.source: The runtime uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> for correlation if it is present, otherwise the **CorrelatesWith** property of the messaging activity will be used.
trans-unit.target: Il runtime usa la <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> per la correlazione, se presente, altrimenti il **CorrelatesWith** verrà utilizzata una proprietà dell'attività di messaggistica.

trans-unit.source: If both are absent, the ambient handle provided by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> or the workflow service is used.
trans-unit.target: Se entrambi sono assenti, viene utilizzato l'handle di ambiente fornito da <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> o il servizio del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to set the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle> on a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply> activity.
trans-unit.target: Nell'esempio seguente viene illustrato come impostare l'oggetto <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle> in un'attività <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.SendReply>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" />.

trans-unit.source: Registers the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> with the workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: Registra <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> con il runtime del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: Unregisters the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> with the workflow runtime.
trans-unit.target: Annulla la registrazione di <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> con il runtime del flusso di lavoro.
